statements: SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < 10 AND price < 100 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE stock_quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20
SELECT product_id, price FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE product_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE product_description LIKE '%premium%'
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, description FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE description LIKE '%organic%' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, price FROM Products WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 100 ORDER BY product_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price <= 100 ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_status FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Pending';
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 100 ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' AND customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_status FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, p.product_price, c.customer_name FROM products p JOIN customers c ON p.product_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, o.order_date, p.product_name FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.order_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.quantity, products.product_name FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE orders.quantity >= 10;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, delivery_status FROM shipments WHERE delivery_status = 'In Transit' ORDER BY shipment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity > 5 AND order_date <= '2022-10-15'
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, delivery_status FROM shipments WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY shipment_date
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, description FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_name, price, description FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%Shoes%' AND price < 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, description, c.category_name FROM products p INNER JOIN product_categories c ON p.product_id = c.category_id;
